alert.note: Alert for Burleigh; Emmons; Morton (North Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 26 at 5:26PM CDT until July 26 at 6:15PM CDT by NWS Bismarck
info.description: The National Weather Service in Bismarck has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southeastern Burleigh County in south central North Dakota... East central Morton County in south central North Dakota... Northwestern Emmons County in south central North Dakota... * Until 615 PM CDT. * At 526 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 12 miles southeast of Lincoln, or 16 miles southeast of Bismarck, moving northeast at 45 mph. HAZARD...70 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect considerable tree damage. Damage is likely to mobile homes, roofs, and outbuildings. * This severe thunderstorm will be near... Sterling around 555 PM CDT. Other locations impacted by this severe thunderstorm include Driscoll, Fort Rice, Mckenzie, Moffit, Hazelton Recreation Area, Stumpf State Natural Area and Huff. THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...70 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
